description: Jacketed .357 Magnum ammunition.  The .357 Magnum round is derived from the earlier .38 Special, with a marginally longer case and generating greater pressure.
Jacketed hollow point .357 Magnum ammunition.  The .357 Magnum round is derived from the earlier .38 Special, with a marginally longer case and generating greater pressure.

Jacketed .357 Magnum ammunition.  Someone was down on their luck when they hand-reloaded this one - it's filled with black powder instead of smokeless powder.  Expect lower velocity, muzzle smoke, and a dirtier barrel if you shoot it.

Jacketed hollow point .357 Magnum ammunition.  Someone was down on their luck when they hand-reloaded this one - it's filled with black powder instead of smokeless powder.  Expect lower velocity, muzzle smoke, and a dirtier barrel if you shoot it.
Jacketed .357 Magnum ammunition.  This one has been hand-reloaded by a survivor or perhaps a pre-Cataclysm hobbyist, leading to slightly inferior performance compared to factory-produced ammo.

Jacketed hollow point .357 Magnum ammunition.  This one has been hand-reloaded by a survivor or perhaps a pre-Cataclysm hobbyist, leading to slightly inferior performance compared to factory-produced ammo.
